name: WestNileVirusInfectionTestsForWestNileVirusIgGOrTotalAntibodyQuantitative
title: West Nile Virus Infection (Tests for West Nile virus IgG or Total Antibody [Quantitative])
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of West Nile Virus IgG and total antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: West Nile virus IgG and total antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: West Nile virus IgG and total antibody (qualitative) or panel tests)
